unnormalised: Hey folks, return policies, right? So important! Especially now with online shopping booming like Diwali sales. I once bought a saree online, colour was totally off! Thankfully, a good return policy saved me from looking like a clown at my cousin Priya's wedding. Need to check if they accept returns even for slightly damaged goods, like if a biryani stain happened during unpacking, haha! Always read the fine print, friends.
